languages.text: {n}Губернатор печально качает головой:{/n} "Ах, как жаль! Но, может, вы хотя бы..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Губернатор печально качает головой:{/n} "Ах, как жаль! Но разумеется..."

languages.text: {n}The governor shakes his head sadly.{/n} "Oh, what a shame! But perhaps you would at least—"
languages.original_text: {n}Губернатор печально качает головой:{/n} "Ах, как жаль! Но, может, вы хотя бы..."

{n}The governor shakes his head sadly.{/n} "Oh, what a shame! But perhaps you would at least—"

languages.text: {n}总督悲伤地摇了摇头。{/n}“噢，这可真是太遗憾了！不过，或许您至少应该……”
languages.original_text: {n}The governor shakes his head sadly.{/n} "Oh, what a shame! But perhaps you would at least—"

traits.locale_text: {n}总督悲伤地摇了摇头。{/n}“噢，这可真是太遗憾了！不过，或许您至少应该……”

languages.text: {n}El gobernador menea la cabeza con tristeza.{/n} «¡Oh, qué lástima! Pero quizá al menos pueda...».
languages.original_text: {n}The governor shakes his head sadly.{/n} "Oh, what a shame! But perhaps you would at least—"

traits.locale_text: {n}El gobernador menea la cabeza con tristeza.{/n} «¡Oh, qué lástima! Pero quizá al menos pueda...».

languages.text: {n}Vali, hüzünlü bir tavırla başını sallıyor.{/n} "Çok yazık! Bari en azından..."
languages.original_text: {n}The governor shakes his head sadly.{/n} "Oh, what a shame! But perhaps you would at least—"

traits.locale_text: {n}Vali, hüzünlü bir tavırla başını sallıyor.{/n} "Çok yazık! Bari en azından..."

languages.text: {n}総督は、哀しげに頭を振る。{/n}「あぁ、なんとも残念です！だが、もしかしたら、あなたは少なくとも―」
languages.original_text: {n}The governor shakes his head sadly.{/n} "Oh, what a shame! But perhaps you would at least—"

traits.locale_text: {n}総督は、哀しげに頭を振る。{/n}「あぁ、なんとも残念です！だが、もしかしたら、あなたは少なくとも―」

languages.text: {n}Le gouverneur secoue la tête avec tristesse.{/n} « Oh, quel dommage ! Mais peut-être voudrez-vous au moins... »
languages.original_text: {n}The governor shakes his head sadly.{/n} "Oh, what a shame! But perhaps you would at least—"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le gouverneur secoue la tête avec tristesse.{/n} « Oh, quel dommage ! Mais peut-être voudrez-vous au moins... »

languages.text: {n}Der Gouverneur schüttelt traurig den Kopf.{/n} "Oh, was für ein Jammer! Aber vielleicht könnt Ihr wenigstens ..."
languages.original_text: {n}The governor shakes his head sadly.{/n} "Oh, what a shame! But perhaps you would at least—"
